New Records: Chahal also went past Jasprit Bumrah to become India's leading wicket-taker in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan and Shreyas Iyer smashed fifties as India managed to post a mammoth total of 199 for two against Sri Lanka.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar broke SL's back with those early wickets.
Dasun Shanaka c Kumar b Chahal 3 (6)
Chamika Karunaratne c Ishan Kishan b VR Iyer 21 (14)
Janith Liyanage c Samson b VR Iyer 11 (17)
Post-Match Reflections: India take a 1-0 in the series.
